doc.field: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES

The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY
30-123 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 30-123 days 124-150 days 5.90 pct 5.93 pct 124-150 days 151-349 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 151-349 days 350-360 days 5.96 pct 5.98 pct 350-360 days Reuter
